title: Bobby Darling’s Matrimonial Battle Continues, Husband's Plea Questioning Marriage Dismissed
text:
It was about three years ago, Bobby Darling, who was known for playing transgender roles in Bollywood movies, underwent a sex change operation and changed his name to Pakhi Sharma. She even got married to a Bhopal-based businessman Ramneek Sharma.

Just when things seemed to be on a happier note, there was trouble in paradise.

Citing domestic violence and unnatural sex, Bobby Darling filed for divorce from her husband in 2017. He was then arrested after domestic abuse and dowry harassment case was filed against him. And that was the beginning of matrimonial battle between the two.

Twitter

Things got ugly when her husband had reportedly filed an application in the magisterial court in Delhi saying it should not consider her domestic violence allegations because she is not a woman. According to a TOI report, the court has dismissed that application.

In the application, he had said, “the petitioner is by birth a male and is definitely not a woman which is verified by the documents and medical papers annexed with the petition”.

Twitter

Delhi magistrate Ranjani Ranga’s order, on the other hand, said that Bobby had underwent a sex-change operation before wedding. “The order...has not been set aside till date and hence this application is dismissed,” said Ranga as quoted by the Times Of India.

Twitter

Furthermore, Bobby Darling’s counsel Meera Kaura Patel cited a Madras HC order of April 2019 and argued that it recognised “the marriage between a Hindu male with Hindu transgender woman to be a valid marriage under the Hindu Marriage Act”.

Bobby Darling’s original name was Pankaj Sharma.
